search.query: | inputlookup $lookup$_all_saved_searches_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields eai:acl.app title eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | fields - search | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_savedsearch$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_dashboards.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, disabled as src_disabled, label as src_label, eai:acl.owner as src_owner | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields eai:acl.sharing, eai:acl.app, disabled, label, title, eai:acl.owner | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, disabled as dest_disabled, label as dest_label, eai:acl.owner as dest_owner | eval dest="true" ] | stats values(*) as * by title | fields - eai:data | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_dashboard$ src="true" src_APP=$app_dashboard$

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_field_extraction_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, attribute as src_attribute, author as src_author | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/props/extractions | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing author attribute | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, attribute as dest_attribute, author as dest_author | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) |fields - value | search dest=$missing_field$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_eventtypes_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, tags as src_TAGS | append [| rest splunk_server=local servicesNS/-/-/saved/eventtypes | fields eai:acl.app,eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing,search,tags,title | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, tags as dest_TAGS | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | fields - search | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_eventtype$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_lookup_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING | append [| rest splunk_Server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/lookup-table-files | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_lookup$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_datamodel_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, displayName as src_displayName | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, displayName as src_displayName | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_datamodel$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_users_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rex field=email "^(?<id>.*?)(\@|$)" | eval title=lower(title) | rename email as src_email, realname as src_realname, type as src_type, title as src_title | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/authentication/users | fields email realname title type | rex field=email "^(?<id>.*?)(\@|$)" | rename email as dest_email, realname as dest_realname, type as dest_type, title as dest_title | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by id | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_users$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_macros_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, definition as src_definition, args as src_args, disabled as src_disabled, eai:acl.owner as src_owner, eai:acl.sharing as src_sharing | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/configs/conf-macros | fields title eai:acl.app definition args disabled eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing |rename eai:acl.app as dest_app, definition as dest_definition, args as dest_args, disabled as dest_disabled, eai:acl.owner as dest_owner,eai:acl.sharing as dest_sharing | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_macros$ src="true"
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the saved searches' content comparison

search.query: | search src_APP=$app_savedsearch$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_savedsearch$)| sort src_APP
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the dashboards' content comparison

search.query: |search src_APP=$app_dashboard$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_dashboard$)| sort src_APP
| sort src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the Field extractions' value comparison

search.query: | search src_APP=$app_field$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_field$) | sort src_APP
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the Eventtypes' value comparison

search.query: | search src_APP=$app_eventtype$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_eventtype$)| sort src_APP

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_tags.csv | eval src = "true" | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/search/tags | fields title | eval dest="true" ] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_tags$ src="true" | sort title
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
| search src_APP=$app_lookup$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_lookup$)| sort src_APP
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
|search src_APP=$app_datamodel$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_datamodel$)| sort src_APP
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
|search src_APP=$app_macros$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_macros$) | sort src_APP
| sort title

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_apps_src.csv | eval src = "true" | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/apps/local | fields label title | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing_app$ src="true"
